skindex:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
skindex:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

skindex:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
skindex:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.

skindex:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
skindex:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

skindex:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
skindex:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !skindex:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

skindex:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
